munit:test.name: ifClientHasValidAppointmentIdAndAppointmentIdExistsInTheDB-WeShouldReturn200SUCCESS-Test1
munit:test.doc:description:
Purpose of this test suite:
Challenge1-1: Happy Path: - Test deleting an appointment when database creds are correct - Test deleting an appointment when appointment id is valid and exists in DB
Sad Path: - Test deleting an appointment when one appointmentId is not valid - Test deleting an appointment when one appointmentId does not exist in the database - Test deleting an appointment when database creds are incorrect - Test deleting an appointment when database server is down
Challenge1-2: - My test would check if the parameter (appointment Id) exists in the database - My test would check if the appointment has been soft-deleted from the database - My test would check http status code and message in response
